Text: Share This article FORT WORTH, Texas - New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie is endorsing Donald Trump in the race for the GOP presidential nomination. Christie said at a news conference in Fort Worth, Texas, that Trump "will do what needs to be done to protect the American people." "He is strong enough to take on the D.C. establishment," Christie told reporters in Fort Worth. "Turn away from the amateur acts from Washington, D.C., and turn toward a strong leader. That's who this is." Christie recently ended his own campaign for the Republican presidential nomination. Copyright 2016 The Associated Press. All rights reserved.
